snippet: The authorities stopped short of accusing agents of violating the country’s election law, a decision the opposition party called a whitewash.
abstract: South Korea police say at least two officers from South Korean National Intelligence Service illegally posted comments online criticizing the political opposition ahead of December presidential election; it remains unclear whether agents were part of operation to influence election, as opposition Democratic United Party claims.
lead_paragraph: The authorities stopped short of accusing agents of violating the country’s election law, a decision the opposition party called a whitewash.

headline.seo: South Korean Intelligence Officers Are Accused of Political Meddling
headline.main: South Korean Intelligence Officers Are Accused of Political Meddling
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Intelligence Officers Are Accused of Political Meddling
